column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=A :
#Text=I want to move forward with fresh new ideas to make our city and our community a better , more vibrant and safer place in which to live and raise our families .
#Text=Being on City Council means making difficult choices .
#Text=I believe I have the experience , the understanding of our community , and the track record of working with everyone to be able to make the best choice .
#Text=I believe we should move forward , not backwards .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I have lived in the community for 23 years and have worked at City Hall for the past 3 years so I know this community , the people and the issues .
#Text=I know this job .
#Text=I 've listened and heard residents ' concerns .
#Text=I am now ready to act on their behalf because I know the priorities will be to address infill development , property standards and traffic .
#Text=I will support finding solutions to garbage , transit and crime .
#Text=We need to invest in our City 's future .
#Text=Q :
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=A :
#Text=Currently I am an unpaid leave of absence from the City of Toronto .
#Text=Prior to that I was a Resource to 2 Local Erosion Control Projects and to the East Scarborough Storefront Steering Committee .
#Text=My other previous community commitments include :
#Text=Centennial Community and Recreation Association ( CCRA ) Executive
#Text=Heart and Stroke , Fundraising Chair
#Text=West Hill Softball League , Volunteer
#Text=Parent Council and Teacher 's Assistant
#Text=Scouts Canada , Vice Chair and Key Leader
#Text=West Hill Community Advisory Panel
#Text=Q :
#Text=Which council decision ( since the 2003 election ) do you feel the city/your ward should be most proud of , and which was least desirable ?
#Text=A :
#Text=The completion of phase one of the new waterfront trail at the foot of Port Union Road is the best accomplishment in Ward 44 over the past three years .

#Text=The completion of this trail was a cooperative effort of the Toronto Waterfront Revitalization Corporation , the Federal and Provincial Governments and the City of Toronto and the Toronto and Region Conservation Authority .
#Text=It is truly a waterfront park we can all be proud of .

#Text=I believe the decision not to build a subway in Scarborough and to run a dedicated light rail line on the Scarborough RT is a disservice to Ward 44 – we need better transit in the eastern part of Scarborough .
#Text=Q :
#Text=If you were elected as a " rookie " councillor , What would you bring to the table beyond the incumbent ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I 'm currently the assistant to the outgoing City Councillor and sometimes there is the assumption that I would be a carbon copy .
#Text=I 'm not .
#Text=I have my own views on the issues and my own way of getting the job done .
#Text=Too often politicians get into office and we never hear from them except at election time .
#Text=I always have been accessible and will continue to do so .
